com.argox.sdk.barcodeprinter.emulation.pplb

Class PPLB_FormUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.argox.sdk.barcodeprinter.emulation.pplb.PPLB_FormUtil

  • public class PPLB_FormUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides the method of PPLB emulator 'Form' related procedures. This class is used in PPLB class.

    • Method Detail

      • storeFormStart

        public final void storeFormStart(java.lang.String name)
                          throws BarcodePrinterIllegalArgumentException,
                                 BarcodePrinterGeneralException
        This function is used to create and start a 'Form', and this function should be used in pair with storeFormStart.
        Parameters:
        name - [in] The 'Form' name to create. Range: 1~8 English letters or numbers (alphanumeric) characters.
        Throws:
        BarcodePrinterIllegalArgumentException - Invalid parameter or parameter is out of the valid range.
        BarcodePrinterGeneralException - General error, byte array operation error.

        If not used in pair with storeFormEnd, unexpected errors will occur, please be cautious when using this.

        This function only create and download 'Form', then store the content of 'Form' into the printer's storage device. No printing or deleting the 'Form' will be executed.

        Hence, if want to execute (print), please call printStoreForm; if want to delete, please call deleteStoreForm.

        As Flash memory has a limited access lifespan, unless 'Form' is to be repeatedly used, it is recommended to store the 'Form' in DRAM.

        See Also:
        storeFormEnd(), printStoreForm(java.lang.String), deleteStoreForm(java.lang.String), PPLB_SetUtil.setStorage(com.argox.sdk.barcodeprinter.emulation.pplb.PPLBStorage)

      • storeFormEnd

        public final void storeFormEnd()
                        throws BarcodePrinterGeneralException
        This function is used to end the 'Form' in use, and this function should be used in pair with storeFormStart. If not used in pair with storeFormStart, unexpected errors will occur, please be cautious when using this.
        Throws:
        BarcodePrinterGeneralException - General error, byte array operation error.
        See Also:
        storeFormStart(java.lang.String)

      • deleteStoreForm

        public final void deleteStoreForm(java.lang.String name)
                           throws BarcodePrinterIllegalArgumentException,
                                  BarcodePrinterGeneralException
        This function is used to delete 'Form' stored in the printer.
        Parameters:
        name - [in] The 'Form' name to delete. If the "*" string is used, all 'Form' will be deleted. Range: 1~8 English letters or numbers (alphanumeric) characters or asterisks (asterisk).
        Throws:
        BarcodePrinterIllegalArgumentException - Invalid parameter or parameter is out of the valid range.
        BarcodePrinterGeneralException - General error, byte array operation error.
        See Also:
        PPLB_SetUtil.setStorage(com.argox.sdk.barcodeprinter.emulation.pplb.PPLBStorage)

      • printStoreForm

        public final void printStoreForm(java.lang.String name)
                          throws BarcodePrinterIllegalArgumentException,
                                 BarcodePrinterGeneralException
        This function is used to execute (print) the 'Form' stored in the printer.
        Parameters:

        Throws:
        BarcodePrinterIllegalArgumentException - Invalid parameter or parameter is out of the valid range.
        BarcodePrinterGeneralException - General error, byte array operation error.
        See Also:
        PPLB_SetUtil.setStorage(com.argox.sdk.barcodeprinter.emulation.pplb.PPLBStorage)

      • setVariable

        public final void setVariable(java.lang.String name,
                              int maxNumber,
                              PPLBFieldJustification fieldJustify,
                              java.lang.String prompt)
                       throws BarcodePrinterIllegalArgumentException,
                              BarcodePrinterGeneralException
        This function is used to set the variable (Variable) data to be stored in 'Form' as text and barcode data fields.

        The 'Variable' name for this function must be defined in order, for example: V00 is the first, V01 is the second...

        And this function must be called immediately after storeFormStart.

        Can use setDownloadVariable to give input data or input data from a device, such as a scanner or keyboard.

        Parameters:
        name - [in] The 'Variable' name to create. Format: "VXX", 'V' is uppercase English characters, 'XX' is a number 00~99.
        maxNumber - [in] The longest data length. Range: 1~99; unit: byte.
        fieldJustify - [in] Column alignment position. Use PPLBFieldJustification enum to set up.
        prompt - [in] The prompt string. This is an ASCII string.
        Throws:
        BarcodePrinterIllegalArgumentException - Invalid parameter or parameter is out of the valid range.
        BarcodePrinterGeneralException - General error, byte array operation error.
        See Also:
        PPLBFieldJustification, storeFormStart(java.lang.String), setCounter(java.lang.String, int, com.argox.sdk.barcodeprinter.emulation.pplb.PPLBFieldJustification, int, java.lang.String), setDownloadVariable(byte[])

      • setCounter

        public final void setCounter(java.lang.String name,
                             int maxNumber,
                             PPLBFieldJustification fieldJustify,
                             int step,
                             java.lang.String prompt)
                      throws BarcodePrinterIllegalArgumentException,
                             BarcodePrinterGeneralException
        This function is used to set the counter (Counter) data to be stored in 'Form' as text and barcode data fields.

        The 'Counter' name for this function must be defined in order, for example: C0 is the first, C1 is the second...

        And this function must be called immediately after storeFormStart.

        Can use setDownloadVariable to give input data or input data from a device, such as a scanner or keyboard.

        Parameters:
        name - [in] The 'Counter' name to create. Format: "CX", 'C' is uppercase English characters, 'X' is a number 0~9.
        maxNumber - [in] The longest data length. Range: 1~29; unit: byte.
        fieldJustify - [in] Column alignment position. Use PPLBFieldJustification enum to set up.
        step - [in] The increment value each time.
        prompt - [in] The prompt string. This is an ASCII string.
        Throws:
        BarcodePrinterIllegalArgumentException - Invalid parameter or parameter is out of the valid range.
        BarcodePrinterGeneralException - General error, byte array operation error.
        See Also:
        PPLBFieldJustification, storeFormStart(java.lang.String), setVariable(java.lang.String, int, com.argox.sdk.barcodeprinter.emulation.pplb.PPLBFieldJustification, java.lang.String), setDownloadVariable(byte[])

      • setDownloadVariable

        public final void setDownloadVariable(byte[] data)
                               throws BarcodePrinterGeneralException
        This function is used to input variable or counter data.

        This function must be called after printStoreForm.

        A device that can be used to replace data input, such as a scanner or keyboard.

        Use a newline ("\r\n") to separate different data, and the data sequence is called setVariable and setCounter function order.

        Parameters:
        data - [in] The input string. Data type: byte array. Use newline ("\r\n") to separate different data.
        Throws:
        BarcodePrinterGeneralException - General error, byte array operation error.
        See Also:
        printStoreForm(java.lang.String), setVariable(java.lang.String, int, com.argox.sdk.barcodeprinter.emulation.pplb.PPLBFieldJustification, java.lang.String), setCounter(java.lang.String, int, com.argox.sdk.barcodeprinter.emulation.pplb.PPLBFieldJustification, int, java.lang.String)
